usage.description: A 60-card coastlines expansion with biome-focused cards for creating coastal and maritime worlds. Contains both brand-new cues and themed variants of standard cards.
integration: Create a monoclimate setting - Use only this expansion to create a world of up to 8 microsettings with a single climate focus
Develop specific biomes in a larger world - Use the main deck to create your world and switch to the expansion to develop coastal areas
Mix expansion cards into the main deck - Although some cues may be harder to interpret outside the specific biome, they are largely cross-compatible
Mix cards and use a sideboard - Draw from a set of faceup cards for less random and more intentional worldbuilding

credits.writing: Akira Keith, Athar Fikry, A. Z. Louise, Brendon Alekseii, Cae Hawksmoor, J. D. Harlock, Juliet Kemp, Michael Barker, Sarah Loch, Zach Schuster
